19 typedef uint16_t element_size_t;
20 
21 typedef struct HWPL_PACK {
22  element_size_t left;
23  element_size_t right;
24  element_size_t top;
25  element_size_t bottom;
26 } element_padding_t;
27 
28 class ElementPadding {
29 public:
30  ElementPadding(){ memset(&_value, 0, sizeof(_value)); }
31  ElementPadding(const element_padding_t & value){ _value = value; }
32 
33  inline void set(element_size_t top, element_size_t right, element_size_t bottom, element_size_t left){
34  set_top(top); set_bottom(bottom); set_right(right); set_left(left);
35  }
36 
37  inline void set(element_size_t top_bottom, element_size_t left_right){
38  set_top(top_bottom); set_bottom(top_bottom); set_left(left_right); set_right(left_right);
39  }
40 
41  inline element_size_t w() const { return left() + right(); }
42  inline element_size_t h() const { return top() + bottom(); }
43 
44  inline void set(const element_padding_t & v){ _value = v; }
45 
46  inline void set_left(element_size_t v){ _value.left = v; }
47  inline void set_right(element_size_t v){ _value.right = v; }
48  inline void set_top(element_size_t v){ _value.top = v; }
49  inline void set_bottom(element_size_t v){ _value.bottom = v; }
50 
51  inline element_size_t left() const { return _value.left; }
52  inline element_size_t right() const { return _value.right; }
53  inline element_size_t top() const { return _value.top; }
54  inline element_size_t bottom() const { return _value.bottom; }
55 
56  element_padding_t value() const { return _value; }
57 
58 private:
59  element_padding_t _value;
60 };

83  set_padding(parent()->padding());

108  static inline bool center(bool v = true){ return v; }
